NOTE.message: Technical note: there is some background noise due to strong wind during the recording session, hissing through the cracks in the roof. Also, I was typing the data as they were being elicited, hence the click sounds of keyboard keys.
The transcription is a surface phonological representation. The underlying tone of this phrase is: MH#.

W.TRANSL: 1 只
1 +classifier for members of a pair, and some types of cattle
1 +classificateur des membres d'une paire, et de certains types de bétail

NOTE.message: The transcription is a surface phonological representation. The underlying tone of this phrase is: MH#.
